name: UFGSharedPostProcessSettings
comment: Presets for post process settings for water volumes

properties.name: mBlendRadius
properties.comment: At what distance do we want to blend in the post process settings for the water

properties.name: mBlendWeight
properties.comment: How much do we want to blend in the post process effect

properties.name: mPriority
properties.comment: Priority of the post process effect
